text: Kɨ ia isɨ 3plan okoruabar ia arigham. Eghtɨ namba 1ɨn okoruam, mɨtiriar ekiam ian aghɨtɨ arɨmariaba ia damutɨ ia nguibar ekiamɨn aven arɨghiregham. Eghtɨ namba 2ɨn okoruam, apaniba izɨ nguibar ekiamɨn azenan mɨdorozir sababar me mɨsoghtɨ me arɨghiregham. Eghtɨ namba 3ɨn okoruam, kɨ me aghamsigh tintinimɨn me amangightɨ me nguazimɨn danganiba bar dar mangeghtɨ, kɨ apanibar amamangatɨghtɨ me uan mɨdorozir sababa inigh men agɨntɨgh mangɨ me mɨsoghɨrarɨgham.
